content: quote: Originally posted by NEMESIS1960: NOT THE PLACE FOR COMING OUT OR BEING OUTED Those who get their kicks outing people are the lowest life form on the planet! How dare they take it upon themselves to decide when and if someone comes out? A friend of mine was outed by one of those scumbags. He ended up killing himself. One of my most shameful memories was that I did not kill the SOB that outed my friend. It's been almost fifty years and I still hate myself for my cowardliness.
